amendment.description: To amend the Science, Mathematics, and Research for Transformation (SMART) Defense Scholarship Pilot Program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3413 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3413 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Akaka. (consideration: CR 6/18/2004 S6971-6980) To amend the Science, Mathematics, and Research for Transformation (SMART) Defense Scholarship Pilot Program.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3413 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3413 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Akaka.
